tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geothermal_exploration_data (
  drill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drill_depth FLOAT,
  drill_temperature FLOAT,
  drill_location VARCHAR(255),
  seismic_survey_id INT,
  seismic_survey_date DATE,
  seismic_survey_results TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE drilling_results (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  well_name VARCHAR(50),
  depth INT,
  temperature DECIMAL,
  pressure DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE seismic_surveys (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  survey_name VARCHAR(50),
  survey_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  depth_covered DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE exploration_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  well_id INT,
  survey_id INT,
  result_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (well_id) REFERENCES drilling_results(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (survey_id) REFERENCES seismic_surveys(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (result_id) REFERENCES drilling_results(id)
);

CREATE TABLE drilling_results (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  well_id INT,
  depth FLOAT,
  temperature FLOAT,
  date DATE
);
